summary: At the time of the Invasion of Normandy, an American soldier is asked to impersonate a British General in order to confuse the Nazi spies and assassins in London.
cast: Danny Kaye|Dana Wynter|Wilfrid Hyde-White|Margaret Rutherford|Diana Dors|Allan Cuthbertson|Jesse White|Gregory Walcott|Terence de Marney|Rex Evans|Rudolph Anders|Edgar Barrier|Pamela Light|Ben Astar|Bobby Watson
keywords: spy comedy|adolf hitler character|year 1944|redheaded man|food fight
title: Plan 402: El doble del general
